scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Calendar_Map_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($event = false) #set ($event = $calendar_v1_events.Current) #if ($event == false) $core_v2_widget.hide() #end #if (!$geocoding_v1_core.IsEnabled) $core_v2_widget.hide() #end #set ($latitude = $event.Latitude) #set ($longitude = $event.Longitude) #if ($latitude < -90 || $longitude < -180) $core_v2_widget.hide() #end #set ($height = $core_v2_widget.GetIntValue("mapHeight",225)) #set ($width = $core_v2_widget.GetIntValue("mapWidth",225)) #set ($zoom = $core_v2_widget.GetIntValue("mapZoom",15)) #set ($imgUrl = $geocoding_v1_core.GetMapUrl($latitude, $longitude, $zoom, $height, $width)) #set ($mapUrl = $geocoding_v1_core.GetServiceRedirectUrl($event.AddressString))
$core_v2_language.GetResource('CalendarMap_GoToMap')
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="linkArea" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="CF_Title" defaultValue="${resource:Calendar_Map_Title}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="mapZoom" labelResourceName="CalendarMap_MapZoom" defaultValue="15" dataType="Int"> <propertyRule name="minmax" min="1" max="9999" /> </property> <property id="mapHeight" labelResourceName="CalendarMap_MapHeight" defaultValue="225" dataType="Int"> <propertyRule name="minmax" min="1" max="9999" /> </property> <property id="mapWidth" labelResourceName="CalendarMap_MapWidth" defaultValue="225" dataType="Int"> <propertyRule name="minmax" min="1" max="9999" /> </property> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Calendar_Map_Description">Displays map of location for a calendar event.</resource> <resource name="Calendar_Map_Name">Event Calendar - Map</resource> <resource name="Calendar_Map_Title">Map</resource> <resource name="CalendarMap_GoToMap">Go To Map</resource> <resource name="CalendarMap_MapHeight">Height</resource> <resource name="CalendarMap_MapWidth">Width</resource> <resource name="CalendarMap_MapZoom">Zoom</resource> <resource name="CalendarMap_ViewMap">View Map</resource> <resource name="CF_Title">Widget Title</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> </language>
